title: Cursed stuffing
summaries: The Cursed stuffing is a consumable item used to summon the Turkor the Ungrateful boss. It has a 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) chance of dropping from all enemies during the Thanksgiving season (November 1â€“30).

To summon Turkor the Ungrateful, the player must first summon the Pet Turkey with the <linked>Turkey feather</linked>, then use the Cursed stuffing. The summoning will despawn the Pet Turkey and will consume the Turkey feather in the player's <linked>inventory</linked>. Turkor the Ungrateful can only be summoned during the Thanksgiving season.
